last_episode_to_air.name: Wildfire: King of the Horses
last_episode_to_air.overview: Diabloyn has stolen the horses using a magical golden whip, but Sarah's attempts to rescue them are thrown awry when the dying Vesta, the High Chieftain, appoints Wildfire as her successor and demands he take command immediately.

name: Wildfire
overview: Wildfire is an American animated series produced by Hanna-Barbera in 1986. The series follows the adventures of Sara, a 13-year-old girl growing up in the American West, as she discovers her true identity as a princess-in-hiding from another realm who is destined to fight an evil witch. The show was first broadcast on CBS for a single 13-episode season from September 13 to December 6, 1986.

episodes.name: Once and Future Queen
episodes.overview: Sara must prove she is the rightful queen by recovering the butterflies stolen by Diabolyn.

episodes.name: A Visit to Wonderland
episodes.overview: Callie, Brutus, and Dorin are captured for a carousel by children living in a valley where they never have to grow up.

episodes.name: The Ogre's Bride
episodes.overview: Kent and Cherylla are to be married, bringing peace between their villages, but Kent mysteriously disappears. While Wildfire and the others search for him, an ogre terrorizes the nearby farms.

episodes.name: Secret of the Sinti Magic
episodes.overview: Diabolyn schemes to acquire the power of the Sinti, the source of all of Dar-Shan's magic, but things don't go entirely as planned.

episodes.name: A Meeting in Time
episodes.overview: During an accident as Sara travels to Dar-Shan, the girl is tossed back through through time to the time of Queen Serena's marriage...and runs into a much younger Diabloyn as well.

episodes.name: The Highway Man
episodes.overview: A highwayman, Aragon, is making trouble for Diabolyn and Sarah helps him, unaware that he is in cahoots with Diabolyn as part of a larger scheme.

episodes.name: The Pixie Painters
episodes.overview: The legendary pixies appear - they haven't been seen since they painted a picture of Queen Serana, and their appearance now heralds the crowning of a new queen. Whoever they paint becomes the queen, so Diabolyn schemes to make sure she is the one they draw.

episodes.name: The Name is the Game
episodes.overview: Sarah must figure out the name of a troll or she loses Wildfire to him forever.

episodes.name: Strangers in the Night
episodes.overview: Sarah travels to meet with the Great Horse Chieftains so that she can receive the recognition she needs to become Queen.

episodes.name: Dragons of Dar-Shan
episodes.overview: Sarah and Wildfire must return a dragon egg to its parents before the dragons destroy the city of Chimaera.

episodes.name: King for a Day
episodes.overview: Due to Diabolyn's wish gone awry, a frog becomes the new ""King Waddler"" and even Wildfire must serve him. But Diabloyn manages to turn things to her advantage by getting in good with the new king.

episodes.name: Where Dreams Come From
episodes.overview: Diabloyn sends the Spectors, her spirit servants, to the real world to take Sarah away from her father.

episodes.name: Wildfire: King of the Horses
episodes.overview: Diabloyn has stolen the horses using a magical golden whip, but Sarah's attempts to rescue them are thrown awry when the dying Vesta, the High Chieftain, appoints Wildfire as her successor and demands he take command immediately.
